name: IT Project Manager
description:
The IT Project Manager is responsible for providing expert consulting services while overseeing technical project execution activities for the Security Department. The position requires strong experience in project management, including being a PMI-certified professional, and a strong working knowledge of IT Systems.
Role and Responsibilities

The IT Project Manager is responsible for managing assigned staff resources to include Developers, Tester, Technical Architect, and Scrum Master. Must be able to work with remote staff.
Experience with Agile development practices and Agile project management
Manage the implementation of technical requirements and project deliverables to include workflows/wireframes, architectures (software and infrastructure), using tools such as MS Project/Visio
IT Project Manager must have experience managing, directing, and implementing projects using modern web technologies â€“ JavaScript, .NET MVC/HTML5, Web API/web services, mobile capabilities are some examples of our technologies.
Experience in managing a diverse group of functional activities, subordinate groups of technical and administrative personnel
Work with client decision makers on particular systems designs within the confines of client-mandated policies and governance
Interaction with clients to elicit functional and system requirements
Travel to other offices as requested
Travel to client site (DC metro), tradeshows, conferences as requested

Qualifications and Education Requirements

An understanding of different system configurations (both hardware, software and networking) that support solid design
An understanding of best practices with respect to IT software and systems implementation (Agile)
Proactive problem solving, and the ability to work autonomously
Effective Verbal and Written Communications Skills
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite including MS Word, Visio, Excel and Project
Attention to detail
Must be able to work independently and in a team environment
Bachelor degree or equivalent required
7 - 10 years of IT services experience with explicit project management experience
Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification preferred
Department of Homeland Security (DHS) badge preferred
Transportation Security Administration (TSA) experience preferred
Secret Clearance required
